config: As a result of the lockdown, stress may take a high toll on our productivity and, most importantly, our health. Don’t panic! Stress relief is right at your fingertips. In addition to the tips provided in our last newsletter, we would like to share new stress management tools. Try them out, reduce stress, and get more done.

description: www.calm.com Calm promises to help you sleep better, boost confidence, and reduce stress and anxiety, all with the help of guided meditations, soothing music, and bedtime stories.

www.yogastudioapp.com In this app, you’ll find general classes for beginners, as well as classes to help with mental health and back pain. There’s even a Desk Series you can do during a much-needed break.

www.headspace.com Headspace is an app that helps you learn how to meditate and live mindfully. There are hundreds of sessions that help you deal with stress, sleep, focus, and anxiety, as well as shorter guided meditations.
